text:
This sunny weather really made it a perfect day for
clam-digging... but this sunlight is startin' to get a bit rough...!

Yeah By the time we're finished,
we might have melted from the heat.

Shall I... wrap a wet towel...
around your neck...?

A towel would be nice and all, but I'd prefer
something a bit more comfortable, you know.

Like a canopy so we could sit in the shade,
or something
And maybe some air conditioning to cool off

...then if we could just get a sofa
to curl up on...

Mamimin... I don't think that would be
clam-digging any more,would it...?
